arts.ttl: Callum Hudson-Odoi earns Nottingham Forest point at Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Forest came closest to walking away with all three points when Igor Jesus hit the post in stoppage time.

arts.ttl: Hudson-Odoi rescues point for Nuno's Forest at Palace
arts.sum: Callum Hudson-Odoi cancelled out Ismaila Sarr's volley to rescue Nottingham Forest a point against Crystal Palace in a 1-1 draw at Selhurst Park.

arts.ttl: Nuno's Nottingham Forest future remains in doubt as Crystal Palace decision made
arts.sum: Nuno Espirito Santo took training at Nottingham Forest on Saturday morning before travelling south ahead of game against Crystal Palace despite his stunning claims about relationship with owner Evangelos Marinakis

arts.ttl: Forest boss Nuno Espirito Santo expected to remain in charge for match at Palace
arts.sum: The Portuguese suggested his job was at risk on Friday.

arts.ttl: Three debutants in contention to feature: Predicted Nottingham Forest XI vs. Crystal Palace
